java/liquibase/database/sql/AddDefaultValueStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class AddDefaultValueStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007     private String schemaName;
00008     private String tableName;
00009     private String columnName;
00010     private Object defaultValue;
00011 
00012 
00013     public AddDefaultValueStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, Object defaultValue) {
00014         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00015         this.tableName = tableName;
00016         this.columnName = columnName;
00017         this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00021         return !(database instanceof SQLiteDatabase);
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00025         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00026             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00027         }
00028         
00029         if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00030             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " REPLACE " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00031         } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00032             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD CONSTRAINT " + ((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue()) + " FOR " + getColumnName();
00033         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00034             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " SET DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00035         } else if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00036             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00037         } else if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00038             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " WITH DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00039         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00040                         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " ADD DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00041         }
00042 
00043         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " SET DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getColumnName() {
00047         return columnName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public String getSchemaName() {
00051         return schemaName;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public String getTableName() {
00055         return tableName;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00059         return ";";
00060     }
00061 
00062     public Object getDefaultValue() {
00063         return defaultValue;
00064     }
00065 }
